title: NetSuite SuiteScript Development: When to Build Custom vs Use Native Features
subTitle: How to Make Smart Customization Decisions That Save Money and Reduce Technical Debt
description: Learn when to build custom SuiteScript solutions versus using NetSuite's native features. Expert guidance to avoid over-customization, reduce costs, and make strategic development decisions.
author: James Plant

metadata.title: NetSuite SuiteScript Development: When to Build Custom vs Use Native Features | The Bearded Developer
metadata.description: Learn when to build custom SuiteScript solutions versus using NetSuite's native features. Expert guidance to avoid over-customization, reduce costs, and make strategic development decisions.
